title: Why should society support scientific research? - Quora

response.answer_text: Scientific research can promote the raise of the productivity of the society.Which means it can help people produce more goods in a much shorter time and better quality. From the perspective of a country, if scientific research will not be supported, that country will face a highly pressure and threaten from other counties due to the technology advancement.Technology development will largely determine the military and economic power of a country. From personally view,our next generation need to be good educated with support.A large part of the area will focus on scientific research,so if we want our children to perform better than us and create a better future.We need to support the scientific research.Nowadays, the AI technology is a very good example that society should support the scientific research. In the long run, we not only benefit from the progress and facility,but we can harvest from the investment into the AI scientific research. Not the least,scientific research will help human being to know the unknown things in the society,that deep understanding will contribute ourselves to get better way to get along with the new environment and new world.

Interesting question. Which research would you not carry out. 1 Small pox 2. Polio 3 All cancers 4. Infant mortality. The list goes on. Now what about research. M.R.I. scanners. X-ray scanning. There are a vast number of different research projects going on funded by the people for the benefit of the people all the time. Then there are the other research programs. Space research. Etc There are some that may make you wonder why it is necessary. But in the main research is vital to improving our lives, our knowledge and the well being of our existence. Research is very important and has many benefits.
